message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,000.  This reflects the value of the product and gives you a fair price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $10,500.

Bob, I'm still committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. I'm willing to drop my price to $10,800. This is a good compromise, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $10,700.

Bob, I'm really trying to be fair here.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10,750. This is the very best I can do. If you're not interested, I will unfortunately have to move on to another buyer.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $10,650.
